data.name: Emotes creator tool - Hats & Caps
data.detailed_description:
Emotes Creator Tool Hats & Caps pack is a DLC including some new elements for your emotes:
- Hats
- Caps
- Masks
- Ears
- Horns
- Accessories...

114 new design to use in your creations
